basic.Peptide Name: SpCrus3 (S. paramamosain crustin 3; type 1, modular design; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 6S=S; UCSS1a)
basic.Target Organism: Active against S. aureus, B. subtilis, and B. megaterium (MIC below 6.2-12.5 uM), Gram- V. parahaemolyticus (MIC <25 uM), V-alginolyticus, V-harveyi, E-coli, A-hydrophila, fungi P-pastoris (MIC >25 uM), and C. albicans (MIC <25 uM). 7/2021
